name: Ramp
desc: A basic angled platform with low bounce.

name: Lever
desc: Lever anchored to a hinge, which can rotate freely.

name: See Saw
desc: See saws (with or without weight) with angle-limited rotation.

name: Cannon
desc: Launches the ball in the direction of the cannon, adding speed.

name: Fan
desc: Gently pushes the ball in the direction of the fan. Less powerful than the cannon.

name: Funnel
desc: Transports an object from the wide end of the funnel to the narrow end.

name: Bucket
desc: Catches an object from the open face and reflects off of other sides.

name: Polygon
desc: Polygon-shaped tools: triangle, square, pentagon, hexagon.

name: Bouncy Polygon
desc: Bouncy versions of triangle, square, pentagon, hexagon.

name: Belt
desc: Conveyer belt to transport left or right at constant speed.

name: Ball
desc: Low-bounce and high-bounce variations of round tools.
